lines.text: Here is your first patient.
Hello, Molly. Are you ready to take a ride in my big, white chair?
[screams and runs out of the office]
All right, then.

[talking about her Tooth Fairy dress]
The one who designed this should rot in hell!
He is.
Aren't you a little big to be a fairy?
No! You're short.

[about to be sent down in the Hellavator]
Rogers, go to hell!
Oh! This isn't hell, is it?
No it's 5th and Main Street.

[the parents see her]
I know what you're thinking, pink and white after Labor Day. It wasn't my idea, I swear.
It's going to be all right.
It's not all right when you're taken to the Hellavator!
I was just trying to help the children.
[Raul has just shown Katherine how to fly]
Oh, it can't be that easy!
If you can do the first few steps of the YMCA, piece of cake! Well, personally I've found being dead helps too.
[Cupid shoots an arrow that nearly hits Rogers]
Oh, watch that!
Sorry, it slipped.
Nice outfit.
Right back at you.

[to Rogers]
Cupid, I take it?
Ha, yes, to you. To me he'll always be a lousy divorce attorney.
[Rogers is painting her nails as Katherine exits "The World" trailer]
Ah, there you are! I was waiting for an eternity! Dr. Lewis, why did you visit the same house on three consecutive evenings?

[mock surprise]
Three teeth in three days. Isn't that amazing? I think that kid's been flossing too much!

Well, I know you're up to something. You think you've found a way to slip through these duties as you slipped through life. But one day you'll slip up. And when you do, I'll be right there pressing the down button for your express ride on the Hellavator.
Oh, Rogers, you've got to quit sweet talking me like this. All the other dentists are going to get jealous!
Nice color.
[touches Rogers's wet nail]
Oops. Hm.

[menacingly]
You've been warned.
What's in the basket?

[evasive]
Uh, nothing.
Eggs, huh? Are they
[snatches an egg and licks it]
chocolate?
Oh, um.

suckers, jaw breakers. Now they're hooked. That's when they come to me. But I gotta tell you something, pal, the damage is already done. The only thing I can do is fill their holes. You disgust me! Now hop out of my sight!
[hops away]
And that my friends is a dentist's dream. Yeah.
[shuts the door and accidentally pulls out Carrie's loose tooth]
Ow!
[comes back and looks concerned]
Thanks Mom.

[Before she is dragged away by Rogers gang]
Bye-Bye Bobby.
I think I'm getting the hang of this.
